title: Ticket #4857: Minor fixups of ClassAd reference tracking
description:
Minor improvements to GetExternalReferences() and GetInternalReferences():

  • Both versions of GetExternalReferences() should configure the EvalState the same way.
  • If the ad has an attribute that matches one of our special attributes, we should count it as an internal reference. During evaluation, we use the value set in the ad.
remarks:
2015-Jan-30 14:10:03 by jfrey:
The effect of this bug on users is minimal and hard to characterize. No version history.
check_ins: 2015-Jan-30 14:09   Check-in [42487]: Minor fixups of ClassAd attribute reference tracking. #4857 * Both versions of GetExternalReferences() should set up EvalState the same way. * If the ad has an attribute that matches one of our special attributes, we should count it as an internal reference. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
